tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_support_interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    interaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE customer_interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    interaction_date DATE,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_summary TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE customer_interaction ( 
   interaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
   customer_id UUID, 
   interaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP, 
   interaction_type VARCHAR(50), 
   interaction_details TEXT 
 );

CREATE TABLE customer_interactions (
    interaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID NOT NULL,
    interaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    interaction_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE customer_feedback (
    feedback_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    interaction_id UUID NOT NULL,
    rating INT NOT NULL,
    feedback_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    feedback_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    interaction_date DATE,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_desc TEXT,
    interaction_feedback VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    customer_email VARCHAR(50),
    customer_location VARCHAR(50),
    customer_phone VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE support_tickets (
    ticket_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    agent_id INT,
    ticket_status VARCHAR(20),
    ticket_priority VARCHAR(20),
    ticket_category VARCHAR(50),
    ticket_description TEXT
);
